query.statement:
SELECT PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, LIFNRNM, TEMNO , NAMET AS NAMET2 , TEMNM , ZZACTSS , CNT , OCCAMT , JUNG_CNT , QC , POINT , POINT1 , CNT_SUM , OCCAMT_SUM , QC_SUM , POINT_SUM , JUNG_CNT_SUM , POINT_SUM2 , QC_SUM2 , CASE WHEN POINT_SUM2 + QC_SUM2 IS NULL THEN CAST(REPLACE(#VAR1#, ' ', '0') AS INT) + CAST(REPLACE(#VAR2#, ' ', '0') AS INT) ELSE POINT_SUM2 + QC_SUM2 END AS TOT , DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY QC_SUM2+POINT_SUM2 desc) AS RANKING FROM ( SELECT PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, LIFNRNM, TEMNO , NAMET , TEAM_NM AS TEMNM , ZZACTSS_NM AS ZZACTSS , CNT , OCCAMT , JUNG_CNT , QC , POINT , QC + POINT AS POINT1 , CNT_SUM , OCCAMT_SUM , QC_SUM , POINT_SUM , JUNG_CNT_SUM , CASE WHEN DEC((POINT_SUM), 10,2) IS NULL THEN 0.00 WHEN DEC((POINT_SUM), 10,2) < 0.00 THEN 0.00 WHEN DEC((POINT_SUM), 10,2) > CAST(REPLACE(#VAR1#, ' ', '') AS INT) THEN CAST(REPLACE(#VAR1#, ' ', '') AS INT) ELSE DEC((POINT_SUM), 10,2) END AS POINT_SUM2 , CASE WHEN DEC((QC_SUM), 10,2) IS NULL THEN 0.00 WHEN DEC((QC_SUM), 10,2) < 0.00 THEN 0.00 WHEN DEC((QC_SUM), 10,2) > CAST(REPLACE(#VAR2#, ' ', '') AS INT) THEN CAST(REPLACE(#VAR2#, ' ', '') AS INT) ELSE DEC((QC_SUM), 10,2) END AS QC_SUM2 FROM ( SELECT P.MANDT ,P.PAPRYYYYMM ,P.ZZACTSS , P.TEAM_CD , P.TEAM_NM , P.ZZACTSS_CD , P.ZZACTSS_NM , P.LIFNR , P.NAME1 AS LIFNRNM , P.TEMNO , P.NAMET , P.CNT , P.OCCAMT , P.JUNG_CNT , CASE WHEN DEC(P.POINT, 10,2) IS NULL THEN 0.00 WHEN DEC(P.POINT, 10,2) < 0.00 THEN 0.00 WHEN DEC(P.POINT, 10,2) > CAST(REPLACE(#VAR1#, ' ', '') AS INT) THEN CAST(REPLACE(#VAR1#, ' ', '') AS INT) ELSE DEC(P.POINT, 10,2) END AS POINT , CASE WHEN DEC(P.QC, 10,2) IS NULL THEN 0.00 WHEN DEC(P.QC, 10,2) < 0.00 THEN 0.00 WHEN DEC(P.QC, 10,2) > CAST(REPLACE(#VAR2#, ' ', '') AS INT) THEN CAST(REPLACE(#VAR2#, ' ', '') AS INT) ELSE DEC(P.QC, 10,2) END AS QC , P.CNT_SUM , P.OCCAMT_SUM , P.JUNG_CNT_SUM -- , CASE WHEN DEC(CAST(REPLACE(#VAR1#, ' ', '') AS INT) - CASE WHEN P.JUNG_CNT_SUM IS NULL THEN 0.00 ELSE DEC( DEC(P.CNT_SUM ,10,2) / DEC(NULLIF(P.JUNG_CNT_SUM, 0),10,2) * CAST(REPLACE(#VAR3#, ' ', '') AS INT), 10, 2) END , 10, 2) IS NULL THEN CAST(REPLACE(#VAR1#, ' ', '') AS INT) ELSE DEC(CAST(REPLACE(#VAR1#, ' ', '') AS INT) - CASE WHEN P.JUNG_CNT_SUM IS NULL THEN 0.00 ELSE DEC( DEC(P.CNT_SUM ,10,2) / DEC(NULLIF(P.JUNG_CNT_SUM, 0),10,2) * CAST(REPLACE(#VAR3#, ' ', '') AS INT), 10, 2) END , 10, 2) END AS POINT_SUM -- , CASE WHEN DEC(CAST(REPLACE(#VAR2#, ' ', '') AS INT) - CASE WHEN P.JUNG_CNT_SUM IS NULL THEN 0.00 ELSE DEC( DEC(P.OCCAMT_SUM ,10,2) / DEC(NULLIF(P.JUNG_CNT_SUM, 0),10,2) / CAST(REPLACE(#VAR4#, ' ', '') AS INT), 10, 2) END , 10, 2) IS NULL THEN CAST(REPLACE(#VAR2#, ' ', '') AS INT) ELSE DEC(CAST(REPLACE(#VAR2#, ' ', '') AS INT) - CASE WHEN P.JUNG_CNT_SUM IS NULL THEN 0.00 ELSE DEC( DEC(P.OCCAMT_SUM ,10,2) / DEC(NULLIF(P.JUNG_CNT_SUM, 0),10,2) / CAST(REPLACE(#VAR4#, ' ', '') AS INT), 10, 2) END , 10, 2) END AS QC_SUM -- , CASE WHEN P.JUNG_CNT_SUM IS NULL OR P.JUNG_CNT_SUM = 0.00 THEN 0.00 ELSE DEC(CAST(REPLACE(#VAR1#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE) - DEC( DEC(P.CNT_SUM ,10,3) / DEC(NULLIF(P.JUNG_CNT_SUM, 0),10,3) * CAST(REPLACE(#VAR3#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE), 10, 3) , 10, 2) END AS POINT_SUM -- , CASE WHEN P.JUNG_CNT_SUM IS NULL OR P.JUNG_CNT_SUM = 0.00 THEN 0.00 ELSE DEC(CAST(REPLACE(#VAR2#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE) - DEC( DEC(P.OCCAMT_SUM ,10,2) / DEC(NULLIF(P.JUNG_CNT_SUM, 0),10,2) / CAST(REPLACE(#VAR4#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE), 10, 2) , 10, 2) END AS QC_SUM , CASE WHEN P.JUNG_CNT_SUM IS NULL OR P.JUNG_CNT_SUM = 0.00 THEN 0.00 ELSE DEC(CAST(REPLACE(#VAR1#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE) - DEC( DEC(P.CNT_SUM ,10,2) / DEC(NULLIF(P.JUNG_CNT_SUM, 0),10,2) * CAST(REPLACE(#VAR3#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE), 10, 3) , 10, 2) END AS POINT_SUM , CASE WHEN P.JUNG_CNT_SUM IS NULL OR P.JUNG_CNT_SUM = 0.00 THEN 0.00 ELSE DEC(CAST(REPLACE(#VAR2#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE) - DEC( DEC(P.OCCAMT_SUM ,20,2) / DEC(NULLIF(P.JUNG_CNT_SUM, 0),20,2) / CAST(REPLACE(#VAR4#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE), 10, 2) , 10, 2) END AS QC_SUM FROM ( SELECT Q.MANDT, Q.PAPRYYYYMM, W.ZZACTSS , L.TEAM_CD , L.TEAM_NM , L.ZZACTSS_CD , L.ZZACTSS_NM , Q.LIFNR, C.NAME1, Q.TEMNO, J.NAMET , CASE WHEN Q.CNT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE Q.CNT END AS CNT , CASE WHEN Q.OCCAMT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE Q.OCCAMT END AS OCCAMT , CASE WHEN Q.QC IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE Q.QC END AS QC , CASE WHEN Q.POINT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE Q.POINT END AS POINT , CASE WHEN Q.JUNG_CNT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE Q.JUNG_CNT END AS JUNG_CNT , SUM(Q.CNT) OVER (PARTITION BY Q.LIFNR, Q.TEMNO ORDER BY Q.LIFNR, Q.TEMNO ) AS CNT_SUM , SUM(Q.OCCAMT) OVER (PARTITION BY Q.LIFNR, Q.TEMNO ORDER BY Q.LIFNR, Q.TEMNO ) AS OCCAMT_SUM , SUM(Q.JUNG_CNT) OVER (PARTITION BY Q.LIFNR, Q.TEMNO ORDER BY Q.LIFNR, Q.TEMNO ) AS JUNG_CNT_SUM FROM ( SELECT MANDT, PAPRYYYYMM , LIFNR , TEMNO , SUM(CNT) AS CNT, SUM(OCCAMT) AS OCCAMT, SUM(JUNG_CNT) AS JUNG_CNT -- , CASE WHEN DEC(CAST(REPLACE(#VAR1#, ' ', '') AS INT) - CASE WHEN SUM(JUNG_CNT) IS NULL THEN 0.00 ELSE DEC( DEC(SUM(CNT) ,10,2) / DEC(NULLIF(SUM(JUNG_CNT), 0),10,2) * CAST(REPLACE(#VAR3#, ' ', '') AS INT), 10, 2) END , 10, 2) IS NULL THEN CAST(REPLACE(#VAR1#, ' ', '') AS INT) ELSE DEC(CAST(REPLACE(#VAR1#, ' ', '') AS INT) - CASE WHEN SUM(JUNG_CNT) IS NULL THEN 0.0 ELSE DEC( DEC(SUM(CNT),10,2) / DEC(NULLIF(SUM(JUNG_CNT), 0),10,2) * CAST(REPLACE(#VAR3#, ' ', '') AS INT), 10, 2) END , 10, 2) END AS POINT -- , CASE WHEN DEC(CAST(REPLACE(#VAR2#, ' ', '') AS INT) - CASE WHEN SUM(JUNG_CNT) IS NULL THEN 0.00 ELSE DEC( DEC(SUM(OCCAMT) ,10,2) / DEC(NULLIF(SUM(JUNG_CNT), 0),10,2) / CAST(REPLACE(#VAR4#, ' ', '') AS INT), 10, 2) END , 10, 2) IS NULL THEN CAST(REPLACE(#VAR2#, ' ', '') AS INT) ELSE DEC(CAST(REPLACE(#VAR2#, ' ', '') AS INT) - CASE WHEN SUM(JUNG_CNT) IS NULL THEN 0.0 ELSE DEC( DEC(SUM(OCCAMT) ,10,2) / DEC(NULLIF(SUM(JUNG_CNT), 0),10,2) / CAST(REPLACE(#VAR4#, ' ', '') AS INT), 10, 2) END , 10, 2) END AS QC -- , CASE WHEN SUM(JUNG_CNT) IS NULL OR SUM(JUNG_CNT) = 0.00 THEN 0.00 ELSE DEC(CAST(REPLACE(#VAR1#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE) - DEC( DEC(SUM(CNT) ,10,2) / DEC(NULLIF(SUM(JUNG_CNT), 0),10,2) * CAST(REPLACE(#VAR3#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE), 10, 2) , 10, 2) END AS POINT -- , CASE WHEN SUM(JUNG_CNT) IS NULL OR SUM(JUNG_CNT) = 0.00 THEN 0.00 ELSE DEC(CAST(REPLACE(#VAR2#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE) - DEC( DEC(SUM(OCCAMT) ,10,2) / DEC(NULLIF(SUM(JUNG_CNT), 0),10,2) / CAST(REPLACE(#VAR4#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE), 10, 2) , 10, 2) END AS QC , CASE WHEN SUM(JUNG_CNT) IS NULL OR SUM(JUNG_CNT) = 0.00 THEN 0.00 ELSE DEC(CAST(REPLACE(#VAR1#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE) - DEC( DEC(SUM(CNT) ,10,2) / DEC(NULLIF(SUM(JUNG_CNT), 0),10,2) * CAST(REPLACE(#VAR3#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE), 10, 2) , 10, 2) END AS POINT , CASE WHEN SUM(JUNG_CNT) IS NULL OR SUM(JUNG_CNT) = 0.00 THEN 0.00 ELSE DEC(CAST(REPLACE(#VAR2#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE) - DEC( DEC(SUM(OCCAMT) ,20,2) / DEC(NULLIF(SUM(JUNG_CNT), 0),20,2) / CAST(REPLACE(#VAR4#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE), 10, 2) , 10, 2) END AS QC FROM ( SELECT MANDT , PAPRYYYYMM , LIFNR , TEMNO , CASE WHEN SUM(CNT) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CNT) END AS CNT , CASE WHEN SUM(OCCAMT) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(OCCAMT) END AS OCCAMT , CASE WHEN SUM(JUNG_CNT) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(JUNG_CNT) END AS JUNG_CNT FROM ( SELECT A.MANDT, SUBSTR(A.CREDT,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, A.LIFNR, A.TEMNO , COUNT(*) AS CNT , (SUM(A.IWBTR) + SUM(A.OWBTR))*100 AS OCCAMT , 0 AS JUNG_CNT FROM SAPHEE.ZQMT007 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0034 AS C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.LIFNR = C.LIFNR AND C.GBN = 'A' AND (C.SO = 'X' OR C.SO3 = 'X') LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0002 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.TEMNO = B.TEMNO LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 M02 ON M02.MANDT = A.MANDT AND M02.POSID = A.PSPID AND M02.POSID_1 = A.HOGI LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.KNA1 AS K ON A.MANDT = K.MANDT AND A.IMPLFN = K.KUNNR WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND (A.LIFNR IS NOT NULL OR A.LIFNR != '' OR A.LIFNR != ' ') AND A.WERKS BETWEEN '1000' AND '3110' AND A.STATUS IN ('3','4','5','6') -- AND A.LIFNR <> '0000008098' AND A.GUBUN = 'J' AND (substr(A.CREDT,1,6) BETWEEN #YYYYMMF# AND #YYYYMMT#) AND A.LIFNR = K.STCD2 -- 설치귀책만 조회되도록 AND C.SO5 <> 'X'
AND A.TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND A.LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND M02.ZZGUBUN = #CHK_GBN#
AND (C.EL_INDC = 'X' OR (C.EL_INDC = 'X' AND C.ES_INDC = 'X')) AND A.LIFNR <> '0000008001'
AND (C.ES_INDC = 'X' OR (C.ES_INDC = 'X' AND C.ES_INDC = 'X')) AND A.LIFNR <> '0000008001'
GROUP BY A.MANDT, substr(A.CREDT,1,6), A.LIFNR, A.TEMNO UNION ALL ( SELECT A.MANDT , substr(A.ZBOSUOUT,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM--준공월 , A.LIFNR -- , C.NAME1 , A.TEMNO2 AS TEMNO , 0 AS CNT , 0 AS OCCAMT , COUNT(*) AS JUNG_CNT FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0034 AS C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.LIFNR = C.LIFNR AND C.GBN = 'A' AND (C.SO = 'X' OR C.SO3 = 'X') WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND (substr(A.ZBOSUOUT,1,6) BETWEEN #YYYYMMF# AND #YYYYMMT#) AND A.TXT04 <> 'C' AND C.SO5 <> 'X'
AND A.TEMNO2 = #ZTEMNO#
AND A.LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND A.ZZGUBUN = #CHK_GBN#
AND (C.EL_INDC = 'X' OR (C.EL_INDC = 'X' AND C.ES_INDC = 'X')) AND A.LIFNR <> '0000008001'
AND (C.ES_INDC = 'X' OR (C.ES_INDC = 'X' AND C.ES_INDC = 'X')) AND A.LIFNR <> '0000008001'
GROUP BY A.MANDT, substr(A.ZBOSUOUT,1,6), A.LIFNR, A.TEMNO2 )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, SUBSTR(#YYYYMMDD0#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS CNT , 0 AS OCCAMT , 0 AS JUNG_CNT FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD0# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD0# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD1#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS CNT , 0 AS OCCAMT , 0 AS JUNG_CNT FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD1# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD1# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD2#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS CNT , 0 AS OCCAMT , 0 AS JUNG_CNT FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD2# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD2# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD3#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS CNT , 0 AS OCCAMT , 0 AS JUNG_CNT FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD3# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD3# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD4#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS CNT , 0 AS OCCAMT , 0 AS JUNG_CNT FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD4# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD4# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD5#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS CNT , 0 AS OCCAMT , 0 AS JUNG_CNT FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD5# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD5# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD6#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS CNT , 0 AS OCCAMT , 0 AS JUNG_CNT FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD6# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD6# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD7#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS CNT , 0 AS OCCAMT , 0 AS JUNG_CNT FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD7# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD7# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD8#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS CNT , 0 AS OCCAMT , 0 AS JUNG_CNT FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD8# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD8# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD9#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS CNT , 0 AS OCCAMT , 0 AS JUNG_CNT FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD9# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD9# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD10#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS CNT , 0 AS OCCAMT , 0 AS JUNG_CNT FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD10# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD10# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD11#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , 0 AS CNT , 0 AS OCCAMT , 0 AS JUNG_CNT FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD11# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD11# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND POSIT = 'X' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO )
) GROUP BY MANDT, PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO ) GROUP BY MANDT, PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO ) AS Q INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0034 AS C ON Q.MANDT = C.MANDT AND Q.LIFNR = C.LIFNR AND C.GBN = 'A' AND (C.SO = 'X' OR C.SO3 = 'X') LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, POSIT, NAMET FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND POSIT = 'X' AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, POSIT, NAMET ) AS J ON J.MANDT = Q.MANDT AND J.LIFNR = Q.LIFNR AND J.TEMNO = Q.TEMNO LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBT010 W ON Q.MANDT = W.MANDT AND Q.LIFNR = W.LIFNR INNER JOIN ( SELECT MANDT , DTEXT3 AS TEAM_CD --팀코드 , DTEXT4 AS TEAM_NM --팀명 , CODE2 AS ZZACTSS_CD --지사코드 , CTEXT2 AS ZZACTSS_NM --지사명 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE N WHERE N.CODE1 = 'PS003' AND N.DTEXT3 <> '' AND N.LANG = 'ko' ) L ON W.MANDT = L.MANDT AND W.ZZACTSS = L.ZZACTSS_CD INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0002 KK ON Q.MANDT = KK.MANDT AND Q.LIFNR = KK.LIFNR AND Q.TEMNO = KK.TEMNO AND KK.DELEF = '' WHERE (W.ZZACTSS IS NOT NULL OR W.ZZACTSS != '' OR W.ZZACTSS != ' ') AND (C.EL_INDC = 'X' OR (C.EL_INDC = 'X' AND C.ES_INDC = 'X')) AND Q.LIFNR <> '0000008001' AND C.SO5 <> 'X'
AND W.ZZACTSS IN ( SELECT CODE2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = Q.MANDT AND CODE1 = 'PS003' AND LANG = 'ko' AND DTEXT3 = #TEMNO# )
AND W.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
) AS P ) ) FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
